### About me 
I‘m currently a first-year Ph.D. student in Statistics at [Shanghai Jiao Tong University](http://www.math.sjtu.edu.cn/). I received my B.S. degree in Statistics from [East China Normal University](http://stat.ecnu.edu.cn). 

### Research interests

includes High-Dimensional statistics, distributed inference, statistical inference of privacy-preserving data, online learning.
